H0.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Mozambique Cichlid

H1.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Gulf Killifish

H2.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Desert Pupfish

H3.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. tilapia

A4.text: The desert pupfish occurs only in three drainage basins: the Salton Sea, California, the Colorado River Delta, Baja California, and in Sonora, Mexico.

A5.text: It has been, and continues to be, preyed upon and displaced by non-native fishes, such as tilapia.

A6.text: Arizona Desert Museum displays the pupfish Cyprinodon macularius.

A7.text: Cyprinodon macularius has a FishBase entry from the January 2010 version.
